PSCT.Base: If your opponent controls 2 or more monsters and this card is in your hand: You can Special Summon this card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 Spell; destroy all Spells and Traps on the field. You can only use each effect of "Burning Dragon" once per turn.
